an7.64:4.1: “Sattime, bhikkhave, dhammā sapattakantā sapattakaraṇā kodhanaṃ āgacchanti itthiṃ vā purisaṃ vā.
an7.64:4.3: Idha, bhikkhave, sapatto sapattassa evaṃ icchati:
an7.64:4.6: Na, bhikkhave, sapatto sapattassa vaṇṇavatāya nandati.
an7.64:4.7: Kodhanoyaṃ, bhikkhave, purisapuggalo kodhābhibhūto kodhapareto, kiñcāpi so hoti sunhāto suvilitto kappitakesamassu odātavatthavasano;
an7.64:4.8: atha kho so dubbaṇṇova hoti kodhābhibhūto.
an7.64:4.9: Ayaṃ, bhikkhave, paṭhamo dhammo sapattakanto sapattakaraṇo kodhanaṃ āgacchati itthiṃ vā purisaṃ vā. (1)
an7.64:5.1: Puna caparaṃ, bhikkhave, sapatto sapattassa evaṃ icchati:
an7.64:5.4: Na, bhikkhave, sapatto sapattassa sukhaseyyāya nandati.
an7.64:5.5: Kodhanoyaṃ, bhikkhave, purisapuggalo kodhābhibhūto kodhapareto, kiñcāpi so pallaṅke seti gonakatthate paṭalikatthate kadalimigapavarapaccattharaṇe sauttaracchade ubhatolohitakūpadhāne;
an7.64:5.6: atha kho so dukkhaññeva seti kodhābhibhūto.
an7.64:5.7: Ayaṃ, bhikkhave, dutiyo dhammo sapattakanto sapattakaraṇo kodhanaṃ āgacchati itthiṃ vā purisaṃ vā. (2)
an7.64:6.1: Puna caparaṃ, bhikkhave, sapatto sapattassa evaṃ icchati:
an7.64:6.4: Na, bhikkhave, sapatto sapattassa pacuratthatāya nandati.
an7.64:6.5: Kodhanoyaṃ, bhikkhave, purisapuggalo kodhābhibhūto kodhapareto, anatthampi gahetvā ‘attho me gahito’ti maññati, atthampi gahetvā ‘anattho me gahito’ti maññati.
an7.64:6.6: Tassime dhammā aññamaññaṃ vipaccanīkā gahitā dīgharattaṃ ahitāya dukkhāya saṃvattanti kodhābhibhūtassa.
an7.64:6.7: Ayaṃ, bhikkhave, tatiyo dhammo sapattakanto sapattakaraṇo kodhanaṃ āgacchati itthiṃ vā purisaṃ vā. (3)
an7.64:7.1: Puna caparaṃ, bhikkhave, sapatto sapattassa evaṃ icchati:
an7.64:7.4: Na, bhikkhave, sapatto sapattassa bhogavatāya nandati.
an7.64:7.5: Kodhanassa, bhikkhave, purisapuggalassa kodhābhibhūtassa kodhaparetassa, yepissa te honti bhogā uṭṭhānavīriyādhigatā bāhābalaparicitā sedāvakkhittā dhammikā dhammaladdhā, tepi rājāno rājakosaṃ pavesenti kodhābhibhūtassa.
an7.64:7.6: Ayaṃ, bhikkhave, catuttho dhammo sapattakanto sapattakaraṇo kodhanaṃ āgacchati itthiṃ vā purisaṃ vā. (4)
an7.64:8.1: Puna caparaṃ, bhikkhave, sapatto sapattassa evaṃ icchati:
an7.64:8.4: Na, bhikkhave, sapatto sapattassa yasavatāya nandati.
an7.64:8.5: Kodhanoyaṃ, bhikkhave, purisapuggalo kodhābhibhūto kodhapareto, yopissa so hoti yaso appamādādhigato, tamhāpi dhaṃsati kodhābhibhūto.
an7.64:8.6: Ayaṃ, bhikkhave, pañcamo dhammo sapattakanto sapattakaraṇo kodhanaṃ āgacchati itthiṃ vā purisaṃ vā. (5)
an7.64:9.1: Puna caparaṃ, bhikkhave, sapatto sapattassa evaṃ icchati:
an7.64:9.4: Na, bhikkhave, sapatto sapattassa mittavatāya nandati.
an7.64:9.5: Kodhanaṃ, bhikkhave, purisapuggalaṃ kodhābhibhūtaṃ kodhaparetaṃ, yepissa te honti mittāmaccā ñātisālohitā, tepi ārakā parivajjanti kodhābhibhūtaṃ.
an7.64:9.6: Ayaṃ, bhikkhave, chaṭṭho dhammo sapattakanto sapattakaraṇo kodhanaṃ āgacchati itthiṃ vā purisaṃ vā. (6)
an7.64:10.1: Puna caparaṃ, bhikkhave, sapatto sapattassa evaṃ icchati:
an7.64:10.2: ‘aho vatāyaṃ kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā apāyaṃ duggatiṃ vinipātaṃ nirayaṃ upapajjeyyā’ti.
an7.64:10.4: Na, bhikkhave, sapatto sapattassa sugatigamane nandati.
an7.64:10.5: Kodhanoyaṃ, bhikkhave, purisapuggalo kodhābhibhūto kodhapareto kāyena duccaritaṃ carati, vācāya duccaritaṃ carati, manasā duccaritaṃ carati.
an7.64:10.6: So kāyena duccaritaṃ caritvā vācāya … pe …
an7.64:10.7: kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā apāyaṃ duggatiṃ vinipātaṃ nirayaṃ upapajjati kodhābhibhūto.
an7.64:10.8: Ayaṃ, bhikkhave, sattamo dhammo sapattakanto sapattakaraṇo kodhanaṃ āgacchati itthiṃ vā purisaṃ vā. (7)
an7.64:11.1: Ime kho, bhikkhave, satta dhammā sapattakantā sapattakaraṇā kodhanaṃ āgacchanti itthiṃ vā purisaṃ vāti.
an7.64:15.1: * Anatthajanano kodho,
an7.64:18.1: Dummaṅkuyaṃ padasseti,
an7.64:19.1: Nāssa hirī na ottappaṃ,
an7.64:23.2: attā hi paramo piyo;
an7.64:27.1: Yathā metaṃ akusalaṃ,
an7.64:28.4: Parinibbanti anāsavā”ti.
